tips.tip1: Maintain a consistent sleep schedule (same bedtime/wake time)
tips.tip3: Keep bedroom cool, dark, and quiet
tips.tip4: Limit screen time 1 hour before bed
tips.tip6: Get regular exercise (but not close to bedtime)
tips.tip7: Reserve bed for sleep and intimacy only
tips.tip8: If you can't sleep after 20 minutes, get up and do a calm activity
